mapper.sql: tsid, ssqy, tssj, azdd_ddh, ssxl, lm, gzfzr, gzry, shr, czr, czsj, beizhu, upload

#{tsid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssqy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, str_to_date(#{tssj},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{azddDdh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssxl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzfzr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzry, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czsj, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beizhu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upload, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT pj.*, sd.keymemo as ssqyname, ss.bdz as bdz, ss.xlmc as xlmc FROM pwbh_jbxx pj LEFT JOIN sys_db sd on sd.keyvalue = pj.ssqy LEFT JOIN sys_ssxl ss on ss.id = pj.ssxl WHERE sd.keycode = 'region' and tsid = #{tsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
